author: CBR
description:
The DCU Green Lantern show has been reportedly delayed until after Supergirl! Is this a red flag? 

How do you feel about that? Let us know in the comments!

#DC #DCU #JamesGunn #CBR #HeroesJourney #Lanterns #GreenLantern

author: CBR
description:
What’s the backstory of Mr. Freeze’s ice-skating henchmen from Batman & Robin? We pitch a ridiculous DC spinoff where Arnold’s Mr. Freeze trains a squad of villainous figure skaters!

What's your wildest pitch for a DC spinoff? Let us know in the comments!

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 6.

title: Arnold’s Mr. Freeze Comes Back… To Train Skating Villains? ⛸️ #Batman #CBR #HeroesJourney

author: CBR
description:
James Gunn’s DCU just jumped from Superman to a rumored Jimmy Olsen series with a true crime twist on Grodd, and we’re designing the wild spinoffs that could follow. 

Heroes Journey hosts Sean O’Connell and Sierra talk through what a Jimmy Olsen DCU series could look like, what a Grodd "true crime investigation" even means, and why James Gunn keeps going back to his own DCU "toy box" while Batman and Wonder Woman sit on the sidelines.

From there, we go full chaos mode, pitching the strangest DCU TV shows we’d secretly watch in a heartbeat!

What are YOUR wildest pitches? Let us know in the comments!

Chapters
00:08 – James Gunn’s DCU: Superman, Jimmy Olsen & Grodd Series
01:17 – Survivor: DC Heroes vs. Villains Reality Show 
02:42 – Alfred Pennyworth Cooking Show Concept
04:04 – Zatara's Reality-Warping Dementia Series
04:52 – Dick Grayson's Gotham-Like Circus Prequel
06:09 – Cyborg Back to College Football
07:55 – Mr. Freeze Ice-Skating Henchmen Origin Pitch
09:19 – Penguin’s Villa
title: These DCU Spinoffs Sound Ridiculous (And That’s Why They’d Work)
